select id, student_id, book_id, status, pay_date, price, create_date, si.code as studentCode, si.student_name, si.images as studentImages, bi.book_name, bi.auther from pay_record pr left join student_info si on (si.id = pr.student_id) left join book_info bi on (bi.id = pr.book_id) where 1 = 1
AND bi.book_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{payRecord.bookName},'%')
AND si.student_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{payRecord.studentName},'%')
AND si.status = #{payRecord.status}
order by pr.create_date desc
